scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build:start: cd frontend && npm run build && cd .. && concurrently "cd backend && npm start" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && npm start" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.clean: cd backend && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../frontend && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf node_modules
